bottlenecks.title: Why Companies Don’t Have Enough Reviews

cards.title: Review collection is a low priority
cards.text: Rarely top-of-mind for busy marketing teams.

cards.title: No consistent follow-up
cards.text: Without timely reminders and clear guidelines, even willing customers often drop off.

cards.title: Automation isn’t enough
cards.text: Without real communication, reviews often not get published or lack quality.

cards.title: Fragmented responsibility
cards.text: The process is often split across marketing, sales, and CSM, and clear ownership is missing.

faqs.question: Do you guarantee a fixed number of reviews per month?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can integrate with popular tools like Podium, Birdeye, and Trustpilot to streamline the review collection process.

faqs.question: Do you communicate as your agency or as our company?
faqs.answer: Always as your company, using pre-approved templates in your brand voice.

faqs.question: How do you increase the chance of getting positive reviews?
faqs.answer: We prepare professional draft responses for negative reviews within 48 hours, which are pre-approved by you to maintain your brand voice.

faqs.question: How do you handle negative reviews?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can integrate with popular tools like Podium, Birdeye, and Trustpilot to streamline the review collection process.

faqs.question: When will we see first results?
faqs.answer: We can manage reviews on G2, Capterra, Clutch, and other major B2B review platforms as per your requirements.

faqs.question: How do you measure success?
faqs.answer: We provide monthly reports detailing reviews published, response times, and overall profile health to track progress and success.
